  • Constructor Details

    • ChessModel

      public ChessModel()
      Constructor method for the model. Builds an 8*8 array containing chessPiece objects.

    • ChessModel

      public ChessModel​(File toLoad) throws FileNotFoundException, NullPointerException
      Builds a Chess model from a given file.
      Parameters:
      toLoad - File to load game from.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      NullPointerException

  • Method Details

    • buildBoard

      private void buildBoard()
      Builds the board for a new game.

    • addBackline

      private void addBackline​(int color)
      Adds back-line pieces (pieces other than pawns) for the color denoted by the parameter.
      Parameters:
      color - 0 for white, 1 for black.

    • getBoard

      public ChessPiece[][] getBoard()
      Getter for the array representing the chess board.
      Returns:
      ChessPiece[][] representing the board.

    • getWhite

      public ArrayList<ChessPiece> getWhite()
      Returns:
      returns the list of white pieces

    • getBlack

      public ArrayList<ChessPiece> getBlack()
      Returns:
      returns the list of black pieces

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Returns the int representing the player that plays next.
      Returns:
      0 if white plays next, 1 otherwise.

    • setTurn

      public void setTurn()
      Sets the turn to the other color.

    • removePiece

      public void removePiece​(int row, int col, ChessPiece[][] pieces)
      Removes a piece from play
      Parameters:
      pieces -

    • printBoard

      public String printBoard()
      Prints the model's current chess board to the console. White pieces printed in upper case, black pieces printed in lower case.

    • printBoard

      public static void printBoard​(ChessPiece[][] pieces, int turn)
      Prints the given chess board to the console. White pieces printed in upper case, black pieces printed in lower case.
      Parameters:
      pieces - ChessPiece[][] chess board to be printed

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame​(File toLoad) throws FileNotFoundException, NullPointerException
      Loads a game from the given file.
      Parameters:
      toLoad - File to load game from
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      NullPointerException

    • writeGame

      public void writeGame​(File toSave) throws IOException
      Writes the current state of the board to the given file. Will overwrite a file if it already exists.
      Parameters:
      toSave - File to save to game to
      Throws:
      IOException

    • boardToText

      private String boardToText()
      Returns a string encryption of the current state of the board. The encryption is used for save files.
      Returns:
      String encryption of board's state
